nodes.text: This Advanced Recon Commando Lieutenant was present at the First Battle of Kamino.

This ARC, alongside another ARC and Alpha-17 were brought out of stasis pods to be used to defend their homeworld of Kamino. The trooper and his brothers saved a group of clone cadets from battle droids. The group destroyed the droids and told the cadets to grab their weapons. After the battle, Alpha began to lecture the cadets. While in the middle of his lecture, droidekas rolled in and shot and killed the two ARCs. This trooper's arm was totally blown off.
